entry.title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet
entry.summary: The provided information highlights a specific issue related to the detection of transactions that create bare CTV (CheckTemplateVerify) unspent outputs with OP_NOP4. This situation is exemplified by a transaction available for viewing at [mempool.space](https://mempool.space/signet/tx/ab953773f8f8306567bf48357d8ca5a179909c12b2bc64ae2ef80f0850708920). The essence of this issue lies in the failure of certain systems or protocols to identify or process transactions involving bare CTV unspent outputs combined with the OP_NOP4 operation, which may imply limitations or oversight in the current handling or tracking methodologies of such transactions. This example serves as a case point for discussing broader implications on transaction verification processes and the need for enhanced detection mechanisms in blockchain technologies.
